title: Sueña conmigo
overview: The auditions for the reality show Soy tu Súper Star have already begun. And everyone wants to participate! Because the winning boy or girl will achieve the fame and success of a musical superstar. And obviously, Clara Molina does not plan to be left behind in the competition.This is the opportunity she has waited for her whole life. The only problem is that her parents do not allow her to sign up. So Clara will have to create Roxy Pop, her secret identity, to attend the reality show's practices and galas.Luca is the complete opposite of Clara. He does not like glamour or TV shows. But he could spend hours playing the guitar in the solitude of his room. Or rehearsing a song with his friends. Luca cannot stand Clara. But very soon, and despite everything, Luca's heart will start beating for Roxy Pop.He dreams of being a musical star. Of finding his soulmate. Of having the most original mascot at school or a rock band in the garage of his house. Dream of achieving everything, and in the meantime, Sueña Conmigo.
